about_the_game:
Darkzan Arena: Downfall – Chaos Unleashed!

Get ready to dive headfirst into absolute chaos with the Downfall DLC! Keosiis, the supreme avatar of chaos, has set his sights on the arena and will stop at nothing to reshape it to his will. He’s bringing a devastating army of warriors and sorcerers, ready to spread destruction and disorder in his name!

🔥 What Awaits You in Downfall?

  • 50+ New Items: Uncover weapons and gear infused with the destructive power of chaos. From unpredictable blades to armor pulsing with chaotic energy, each piece has the potential to turn the tide of battle!

  • 15 New Enemies: Face terrifying creatures and spellcasters born directly from Keosiis’ will. Each enemy comes with unique abilities and an insatiable hunger for devastation.

  • New Quests: Uncover fresh secrets of the arena in challenging missions as you fight to contain the spread of chaos. Brace yourself for tough decisions and unpredictable consequences.

  • New Masteries: Harness the power of chaos and unlock devastating abilities, perfect for turning the tide against Keosiis’ own minions.

🌌 Step into the Eye of Chaos and Prove Your Might!
This isn’t just an expansion. Downfall is a test for the true champions of the arena. Do you have what it takes to resist the chaos? Or will Keosiis turn you into yet another of his pawns?

Get the Downfall DLC now and face the ultimate challenge. Chaos waits for no one – and neither should you!

name: Darkzan Arena Downfall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 300mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 300mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
